channel.title: Code Quality on Bitperi (Periklis Gkolias)
channel.description: Recent content in Code Quality on Bitperi (Periklis Gkolias)

item.title: Code Review for the Solo Dev
item.description: I will start this article, as I did with the previous one in the series. Nothing can substitute a great team. But a real warrior has to be able to rely on thyself if needed. A few people nowadays, work on a team of one. People that are subject matter experts and the very best on their fields (and I am the last human on earth who can give them any professional advice).

item.title: Self Testing for Solo Devs
item.description: Nothing can substitute a great team. But a real warrior, has to be able to rely on thyself, if needed. A few people nowadays, work on a team of one. People that are subject matter experts and the very best on their fields (and I am the last human on earth who can give them any professional advice). People that have just founded, solo, their own company (or their company partners are not technical).
